bytebase.store.SchedulerInfo.WaitingCaus.description: WaitingCause indicates why a task run is waiting to execute.

^(connectionLimit)$.description: Task is waiting due to database connection limit.

^(parallelTasksLimit)$.description: Task is waiting due to parallel execution limit.

^(taskUid)$.description: Task is waiting for another task to complete.

connection_limit.description: Task is waiting due to database connection limit.

parallel_tasks_limit.description: Task is waiting due to parallel execution limit.

task_uid.description: Task is waiting for another task to complete.

bytebase.store.SchedulerInfo.WaitingCaus.title: Waiting Cause

bytebase.store.SchedulerInfo.schema.json.description: SchedulerInfo contains information about task scheduling and execution delays.

^(reportTime)$.description: Timestamp when the scheduler reported this information.

^(waitingCause)$.description: Reason why the task run is currently waiting.

report_time.description: Timestamp when the scheduler reported this information.

waiting_cause.description: Reason why the task run is currently waiting.

bytebase.store.SchedulerInfo.schema.json.title: Scheduler Info
